name: Developing Understanding in Mathematics
description: In this unit, the theoretical basis for teaching mathematics - constructivism - is explored.

name: Anchor University Journal of Science and Technology - Mathematics Papers
description: Collection of peer-reviewed papers on mathematical topics from African scholars at Anchor University.

name: Equity Journal of Science and Technology - Mathematics Section
description: Open access papers on mathematical findings and inventions by African researchers.

name: FUNAI Journal of Science and Technology - Mathematics Research
description: Peer-reviewed articles on pure and applied mathematics from Federal University Ndufu-Alike Ikwo.

name: Direct Research Journal of Engineering and Information Technology - Mathematical Algorithms
description: Papers on computational number theory and algorithms with mathematical foundations.

name: International Journal of Computer Engineering and Data Science - Theoretical Math
description: Research on theoretical computer science with strong mathematical components.

name: Ezumezu: African Perspectives on Logic
description: Studies in African logic with mathematical and computational aspects.

name: East African Journal of Biophysical and Computational Sciences - Mathematics
description: Advancements in natural sciences including mathematics and statistics.

name: African Journal for Industrial and Applied Mathematics
description: Peer-reviewed papers on industrial and applied mathematics from African contexts.

name: Caliphate Journal of Science and Technology - Mathematics Articles
description: Original articles on mathematics and related sciences.

name: Bima Journal of Science and Technology - Math Section
description: Submissions in mathematical fields from African scholars.

name: College Algebra Essentials
description: Covers equations, inequalities, functions, and graphing for first-year students.

name: Calculus I â€“ Differentiation and Integration
description: Introduction to limits, derivatives, and integrals for STEM majors.

name: Introductory Statistics
description: Understanding data analysis, probability, and statistical inference.

name: Linear Algebra Foundations
description: Covers matrices, determinants, and eigenvalues with real-world applications.

name: Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science
description: Sets, logic, algorithms, and graph theory for CS and math students.

name: Advanced Linear Algebra
description: Explores abstract vector spaces, transformations, and diagonalization.

name: Mathematical Modeling and Simulation
description: Learn to model and solve real-world problems using mathematical tools.

name: Applied Probability and Stochastic Processes
description: Stochastic modeling and probabilistic systems analysis.

name: Partial Differential Equations (PDEs)
description: Analytical and numerical methods for solving PDEs in physics and engineering.

name: Numerical Linear Algebra
description: Matrix factorizations and algorithms for scientific computation.

name: Functional Analysis and Hilbert Spaces
description: Covers Banach spaces, Hilbert spaces, and linear operators for advanced research.

name: Advanced Complex Analysis
description: Analytic functions, contour integration, and conformal mappings.

name: Topology for Research Mathematicians
description: Explores continuity, compactness, and topological spaces for modern analysis.

name: Advanced Statistical Theory
description: Measure theory, likelihood estimation, and hypothesis testing at a deep level.

name: Research in Mathematical Logic
description: Advanced proof theory, model theory, and applications to computation.
